Do you support the War against Iraq?
So long, regime! Hello Iraqi people!

I accept it is for what it is? A necessary evil. The moment when shooting starts is the moment our leadership has failed. I accept that when our leadership has failed that also it is the best possible outcome that could have been achived in more than 12 years of diplomacy. I ask for God's forgiveness that I will support the death of many innocent Iraqi men, women, and children. I support our troops when then come back home, for they will need to know that they are welcome back home.

The war in Iraq is absolutely necessary, there is no way around this threat. We cannot put it off anylonger. He (Sadam) is too dangerous to leave in power. If he were to succede in giving NBCWs to any terrorist the next smoking gun would be another smoking American City. This is the right thing to do, no comprimise on our way of life. We will not change to make terrorist, and terrorist nations happy, they will die before we change. I say to hell with Sadam and all people who would threaten our nation.

More people will die under Saddam or by Saddam then will ever die because of the U.S. attack.
 
 Look at Afghanistan experts predicted Vietnam like conditions with massive causalties. What happened in reality? Just the opposite.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Support War?
